channel.title: [Run] Client, Error [HELP]
channel.description:
Hi, well i'm trying to make a server, but when-ever I try to run the client this is what comes up. (First time I try to run it)
Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Right after, that I try to run it again and this time it says :
Error: Could not find or load main class server.server Press and key to continue . . .
This is what is inside the 'run' edit area : [code]@echo off Title Demonic-Scape java -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code] Please someone help me

item.title: [Run] Client, Error [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @to_ezz to ezz
item.description:
@to_ezz wrote:

Hi, well i’m trying to make a server, but when-ever
I try to run the client this is what comes up. (First time I try to run it)

Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Right after, that I try to run it again and this time it says :

Error: Could not find or load main class server.server Press and key to continue . . .

This is what is inside the ‘run’ edit area :

@echo off Title Demonic-Scape java -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Please someone help me

Read full topic
